meanings.definition: A piece of dung dropped by a cow.
meanings.sent1: I saw a cowplop in the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer cleaned up the cowplop from the barnyard.
meanings.sent3: The cowplop looked like a small mound in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The cowplop was a smelly reminder of the farm animals.
meanings.sent5: Stepping on a cowplop is not a pleasant experience.

meanings.definition: To drop dung, as a cow.
meanings.sent1: The cowplops in the pasture are evidence of the cows grazing.
meanings.sent2: Please don't cowplop in the middle of the road!
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cow seemed to enjoy cowplopping near the water trough.
meanings.sent4: The fields were cowplopped with fresh manure after the herd passed through.
meanings.sent5: The cows cowplop as they roam freely in the meadow.
